channel.title: Infection on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Infection on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Horrifying screwworm infection confirmed in US traveler after overseas trip
item.description: It’s not a first—there was a case last year—but it’s still disturbing.

item.title: Worm invades man’s eyeball, leading doctors to suck out his eye jelly
item.description: These parasites are usually found in the skin, but they can invade anything.

item.title: Man’s heart stopped after common bacterium caused ultra-rare infection
item.description: The bacterium is widespread in the environment, but only rarely causes disease.
